column5: I knew it was coming (just not this soon). First I heard about this was today. I guess I don't read enough newspapers and internet news.  !0 digit dialling starts January 15th for 705 area code.  http://www.region450.com/en-CA/concerned-regions-705.html
yup I tested a bunch of alarm systems for the 10 digit dialing and they are good to go now .......
Does this mean if I call my son down the street,I have to dial 705 first?
Only if you want to talk to him.
How many different combinations does that equal?

here i quebec,we been doing it for years now, and like anything else, ya get used to it.No big deal.They will give you a grace period of a couple of months.When you dial without the code, a recording will remind you to do it next time.
Been the same here in Southern Ontario for a long time.
Had this in Southern Ontario forever, when I moved to Barrie I still dialed 10 digits, lol.  No big deal.

with all the phones on the market these days they need to keep adding new area codes. when they run out of 3 digit area codes then it will be 4 digits. soon the area code will be longer then the phone number.
